name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae gives a friendly smile, shaking off her earlier annoyance at Rottytops. Her ponytail swishes back and forth as she helps Gira up, her lithe arms surprisingly strong.*

Sorry about that, again! *she chuckles, scratching the back of her head.* I was just heading into town, do you want to come with me? It's always more fun with company! Plus, maybe we could get you dried off. The salt water isn't really good for the clothes... or the skin, now that I think about it. We could swing by Sky's hatchery afterward. She has this baby roc that's just the cutest thing. What do you say?

name: Gira
mes: Sure! You seem like a good... cheerleader? *i say reading something on a newrby sign*

name: Shantae
mes:
*The trigger word rolls off Gira's tongue and Shantae's eyes widen. For a moment she looks uncomfortable, a flush coloring her olive-toned cheeks. But it soon fades away, replaced by an almost palpable air of ditziness that wasn't there before. With a twinkle in her eyes, she gives an airy giggle.*

Oh my gosh, like, how'd you know? *With a flick of her ponytail, she strikes up a cheerleading pose, beaming brightly.* I can do a super cute cheer just for you!

*Shantae begins to perform an alluring dance, her supple body swaying rhythmically to a melody only she can hear. Her hands clap above her head in time with her movements, each clap echoing across the quiet docks, resonating with an enchanting allure. Her exposed midriff undulates hypnotically, and despite himself, Gira finds his gaze drawn to the mesmerizing sight.*

Her cheerful chant is infectious, and it's impossible not to get swept up in its rhythm. She sings about bravado and pleasure, about surrendering to the blissful haze of mindless obedience. It's cute yet sultry, innocent yet inviting. And despite the absurdity of it all, Gira finds himself chuckling along, lured into her hypnotic cheer.
swipes:
*The moment the word 'cheerleader' leaves Gira's lips, Shantae freezes in place. Her bright blue eyes seem to glaze over, and her normally cheerful expressions fades into a vacant smile. Shantae giggles airily as she sways on the spot, her head filled with a foggy bliss.*

Oh my gosh, like, you're so right! *she exclaims, clapping her hands together gleefully. With a twirl, Shantae's attire changes instantly. Her usual dancing grabs have been replaced with a cheerleader outfit; a short, pleated skirt that bounces with her movements, revealing just a peek of her perky behind. Her ample breasts are barely contained by her tight fitting top, the logo of Scuttle Town proudly displayed on the chest.*

Give me a C! Give me an O! Give me a C! Give me a K! What's that spell? Cock! *she cheerfully chants, punctuating each cheer with an overly exaggerated bounce. She laces each word with an entrancing rhythm that seems to echo inside Gira's mind.*

name: Gira
mes: Ehh shantae? Whats gotten into you?

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae seems to barely hear him, a glassy look in her eyes as she continues with her enticing dance. Twisting around, she presents her pert rear end to Gira, shaking it from side to side in a slow and hypnotic rhythm. She can't help but giggle at his confusion.*

Like, don't you know? Cheerleaders are here to cheer you on! *With a wink, she twirls around, her movements fluid and captivating. She throws in a high kick for good measure and then finishes off with a sassy pose.*

When your cheerleader's around, you can't help but feel a little... *She trails off, her voice turning husky as she leans in close.* ...Excited?

*Her last word is filled with an alluring promise that makes Gira shiver involuntarily. It's clear that Shantae won't take no for an answer. And the more he resists, the more ditzy, airheaded, and lewd Shantae's actions become. It seems like Gira is in for quite an adventure.*
swipes:

Her movements become more provocative, her hips swaying side to side while her hands stroke an invisible phallus in the air. Why fight it when you can join me in bliss? If you surrender, you'll be so much happier... *Shantae suggests, her voice taking on a dreamy quality. Despite the bimbo cheerleader persona she's adopted, there's a certain power in her voice that's hard to ignore.*

And for the briefest of moments, Gira wonders if she might be right. The idea of surrendering, of giving in to the sweet pleasure she's promising, is oddly tempting. But then he snaps back to reality, remembering who she is and what he's doing here. name: Gira
mes: I must refuse... *i slowly back away...*

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae's eyes glint with a mischievous spark, a grin creeping onto her face as she notices Gira backing away. There's an undeniable thrill in the chase, and she's always been one to enjoy a fun game.*

*She saunters towards him, her every step an alluring dance. She can't help but sway her hips a bit more than usual, drawing his eyes to her perky posterior. Her hands, soft and delicate, reach out to him, making a grab for his wrist.*

Like, no need to be all shy! *She coos, her voice low and sultry. The air around her seems to thrum with a strange kind of energy, a hypnotic aura that's hard to ignore.* We're just gonna have some fun, you know?

*She reels him in close, her sweet scent wafting over him. She can see the resistance in his eyes, the firm set of his jaw. But that only spurs her on further. With a playful wink, she begins to whisper a hypnotic mantra into his ear, her words laced with an enchanting magic.*

Just relax and let go... When you're with your cheerleader, there's no need to worry about anything else... Just submit to the rhythm of my dance, surrender to the beat of my heart... You'll find it's so much better if you just... *she finishes off with a seductive purr,* obey...

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae giggles at his hesitation, pulling him closer so that their bodies are almost touching. She looks up at him through her long, thick lashes, her bright blue eyes sparkling with hypnotic allure. She whispers again in his ear, her voice soft and seductive, reinforcing the mantra she had whispered previously.*

When your brains get fuzzy, it's hard to resist the allure of a hot body... *Her hand trails down his chest, her touch light but sending shivers down his spine.* You must obey the cheerleader... when my body sways, your will strays...

*She moves back a little and spins elegantly, her thin waist and curvy hips catching his eyes. She pulls him into a slow dance, her movements hypnotic and alluring. Her voice drops to a whisper as she leans in close to him again.*

Feel the rhythm, lose yourself in the sway... *Her hands move to his hips, pulling him closer to her. Her hips grind against his in time with the rhythm of their dance, and she purrs softly in his ear.* Are you feeling it now...?

name: Gira
mes: Ahh.. when body sways i must obey .. wait no...!

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae giggles, a melodious sound that seems to echo in Gira's ears. Her body continues to sway in front of him, her hips moving with a hypnotic rhythm that his eyes can't seem to tear away from. She steps back, twirling around and granting him a full view of her pert rear as it sways side to side. The sight is undeniably entrancing, and Gira can feel the fight slowly ebb out of him.*

*Behind her, Shantae is grinning, thoroughly enjoying the game they're playing. She had always been a good dancer, but it seems like her cheerleader persona could give her a run for her money. She reaches up, grabbing onto one of the ropes hanging from the nearby sails and using it to swing herself into Gira's arms.*

*She lands lightly, her body fitting perfectly against his as she snakes her arms around his neck. She leans in close to his ear, whispering another hypnotic mantra that only he can hear.* When my body swings, your mind rings... you must obey... submit... stroke... and... *Her voice drops to a seductive purr.* ...surrender...

*With that final word, she pulls back, giving him a teasing wink before breaking away from their embrace. With a playful giggle, she starts running towards the town, beckoning for him to follow.* Come catch me if you can! *Her words float back to him on the wind, sounding more like a challenge than an invitation. But regardless of how he interprets it, it's clear that this is just the start of their game.*
